japanese: お待たせしました、計算終わりました！
translation: Thank you for waiting, I've finished the calculations!

japanese:
見直しもやったんだな？
よし、採点するから待ってろ。
translation:
Did you review?
Right, I'll grade it, hold on.

japanese:
これは間違い……これもダメ……。
……ん？　なんだこれは……。
translation:
This is a mistake... This is wrong too...
Hm? What's this...?

japanese: あわわわ、バツがいっぱい……。
translation: Whooopsie, so many wrong answers...

japanese:
正解率、４０％だ。
相変わらず計算問題が弱いな。
translation:
You scored a 40\%.
As usual, you're so bad at solving equations.

japanese:
本当に見直しているのか？
こことか、あとここもケアレスミスしてる。
translation:
Are you really correcting your mistakes?
There are careless mistakes here and there.

japanese:
今度はちゃんとできたと思ってたんですが
ダメでしたか……。
translation:
I was thinking I did it properly this time,
but I guess not...

japanese: もう一度、間違った問題を解き直すんだ。
translation: Fix the problems you got wrong, one more time.

japanese: はーい。
translation: Okay.

japanese: 上杉さん、できました！
translation: Uesugi-san, finished!

japanese: よし、採点するぞ。
translation: Alright, I'll grade it.

japanese: ドキドキ……ドキドキ……。
translation: *thump-thump* *thump-thump*

japanese:
……んん？
さっきと答えは違ってるが……バツだな。
translation:
...Hmmm?
The answers are different than before,
but...they're wrong.

japanese:
ええっ！？
そこ３回も計算したんですよ？
translation:
WHAAA?!
I did the calculation three times already!

japanese: 逆に３回もやり直して、どうして間違う？
translation:
More like, why are you still getting it wrong
after fixing it three times?

japanese: ……はて？
translation: ...Who knows?

japanese: はて、じゃねぇよ！
translation: Don't give me that!

japanese:
だって３回とも違う答えが出たんです。
だから、間を取って真ん中の答えを書きました。
translation:
Well, I got different answers all three times,
so I got the median from all three different answers.

japanese:
何をどうやったらそうなるんだよ！
間を取っても意味ねぇよ！
translation:
What made you do THAT?!
Going in between is meaningless!

japanese:
何がなんだか、私にもわかりません。
何度やり直しても全部違う答えになっちゃうんです。
translation:
I don't understand what's going on, either.
I get different answers every time I redo it.

japanese:
はう……。
私って、やっぱり数学の才能がないんですね。
translation:
Oh no...
I really just suck at math.

japanese: あ、いや……その……悪い、言いすぎた。
translation: Ah, no...um... Sorry, I said too much.

japanese:
とにかくだ！
俺が見ててやるから、もう一度、
ゆっくり落ち着いて解いてみろ。
translation:
Anyway!
I'll help you this time, so calm down.
Just try once more.

japanese: はい、頑張ります。
translation: Okay, I'll try my best.
